name: Circa Infinity
description: Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 500 MB available space
